author: Tim Stelloh and Ben Kesslen and Caitlin Fichtel
title: Ordered to stay home, but no power to stay productive, entertained
description: As a storm system raged across half of the country, killing scores of people and battering homes and power lines, many were left without electricity. They were also under quarantine.
content:
As a deadly storm system raged across much of the country on Sunday and Monday, killing at least 33 people and battering homes and power lines, more than a million across the South and East Coast were left without electricity.
In the best of times, a power o… [+3788 chars]
